abstract: David Rubenstein, the Carlyle Group co-founder, said on “Charlie Rose” last week that leveraged buyout firms still haven’t solved one of their biggest problems: their image.
snippet: David Rubenstein, the Carlyle Group co-founder, said on “Charlie Rose” last week that leveraged buyout firms still haven’t solved one of their biggest problems: their image.
lead_paragraph: As one of the biggest names in private equity, David M. Rubenstein has seen many ups and downs in his industry.

headline.main: Rubinstein on Private Equity’s Image Issue
